What is Android Service?.top_name: Android service is a component that is used to perform operations on the background such as playing music, handle network transactions, interacting content providers etc. It doesn't has any UI (user interface).
Note: Android service is not a thread or separate process.

Life Cycle of Android Service.top_name: A service is started when component (like activity) calls startService() method, now it runs in the background indefinitely. It is stopped by stopService() method. The service can stop itself by calling the stopSelf() method.
A service is bound when another component (e.g. client) calls bindService() method. The client can unbind the service by calling the unbindService() method.
